description: The verbal order signing history of an order template.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to a verbal signing of the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_TYPE_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of verbal order for the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ordering


Cosign


Discontinuing


Pending Discontinue


Edit


Delete


Continue on Transfer


Discontinue on Transfer


New on Transfer


Unreview on Transfer


Holding


Unholding


Order and Hold


Assigning Administration Responsibility

columns.name: VERB_ORD_COMM_HX_ID
columns.description: The verbal order communicator for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_SIGN_HX_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the verbal order signer for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_RCP_HX_ID
columns.description: The verbal order message recipient for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_MSG_HX_ID
columns.description: The verbal order message ID for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_INST_HX_TM
columns.description: The date/time in external format of the verbal signing of the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_MODE_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verbal order mode for the order template in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Standard

columns.name: ORD_PROV_HX_ID
columns.description: The ordering provider of a verbal order for the order template in this row.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_HX_ID
columns.description: The authorizing provider of a verbal order for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_CMT_HX
columns.description: The comment on a verbal order for the order template in this row.
